result.name: Greenfields Nursery School and Children's Centre

reviews.text: My Son started here in April 2022. He loves his teachers and friends there. Learn numerous things from his nursery. Good communication and cognitive skills. Good in making friends and socialising. All thanks to staff's hardwork and excellent teaching skills.  My child and I surely gonna miss this first place of learning.

All the teachers and receptionist are very helpful, my daughter feels at home in this school with her teachers. I like this school very much but I had to go somewhere else from here so I have to leave the school,,
The receptionist is very rigid and appears to be heartless. The nursery should train their staff to show empathy and compassion especially to toddlers and children.

My daughter loves it here. The staff are so kind and helpful towards the children here there is true compassion and understanding. They truly care about the children's development and ensure the days are well organised and engaging. My daughter is given a lot of attention here and she feels safe and happy here because of the effort the staff make towards her.
The settling in sessions really helped her to form relationships with the staff before she was on her own alone. I wouldn't trust my daughter anywhere else they truly are Outstanding!!!

Lovely building but the main nursery is very chaotic and disorganised. I could never find my child's coat, hat & scarf. They were on the floor or just left around the room. Staff aren't very friendly and a bit false when they see you. I'm pretty sure it won Nursery of the year for the building more than anything. They seem to be more interested in getting the numbers at the nursery rather than the welfare of the kids. There are certainly better nurseries especially where the staff are more sincere and genuinely interested in your child and not being fake with parents as I see it.

address: Recreation Rd, Southall UB2 5PF, United Kingdom
